        public void add(NormGroup normGroup)

      • getNotRepresentedNormGroups

        public java.util.List<NormGroup> getNotRepresentedNormGroups()
        Returns a List of all the norm groups that are not represented in the network. That is, those norm groups that are inactive in the network and all its ancestors are inactive as well
        Returns:
        a List of all the norm groups that are not represented in the network. That is, those norm groups that are inactive in the network and all its ancestors are inactive as well
